New Records: Gerrit Cole tossed seven innings of one-run ball, allowing only one run on six hits with four strikeouts
Key Match Events: The Yankees scored early, with Gleyber Torres doubling on the first pitch and Juan Soto driving in an RBI single for a 1-0 lead
In the fifth inning, Torres drove in Anthony Volpe with a two-on, two-out single to double the lead to 2-0
In the sixth inning, Giancarlo Stanton hit a 117 mph line drive for a sacrifice fly, scoring Aaron Judge to make it 3-0
Pre-Game Insights: Aaron Boone expressed confidence in the team's ability to perform in the ALCS
Post-Match Reflections: Michael Wacha was the losing pitcher, allowing two runs on six hits
Luke Weaver recorded his third save of the playoffs
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Royals scored their only run on a Vinnie Pasquantino double that plated Bobby Witt Jr.
